Of course not… You should go see him. Do you want to know where you can find Camel Cab?

Camel Cab hangs out around the north entrance of Ariant as well as the Sahel region. The camel hears and remembers everything the passengers talk about during the ride so you should definitely go talk to Camel Cab.
